title: Project Submission: error when commenting
body_html:
I can't seem to be able to comment on a project. This is independent from project state (I tried commenting on projects that are accepted, rejected and pending) and from project owner (I tried with projects that belong and do not belong to me, just in case).
Current roles of testing user: organizer, reviewer and supervisor.
body_text:
I can't seem to be able to comment on a project. This is independent from project state (I tried commenting on projects that are accepted, rejected and pending) and from project owner (I tried with projects that belong and do not belong to me, just in case).
Current roles of testing user: organizer, reviewer and supervisor.
body:
I can't seem to be able to comment on a project. This is independent from project state (I tried commenting on projects that are `accepted`, `rejected` and `pending`) and from project owner (I tried with projects that belong and do not belong to me, just in case). 
Current roles of testing user: `organizer`, `reviewer` and `supervisor`.
